title: PSA: You main doesn't need a 55% win rate to be viable
body:
EDIT: Typo right in the title. Sigh.

If your champ is hovering at a 49-51% win rate, CONGRATS! They are viable. They don't need buffs. You can play them just fine. Sure, they may not be as strong as they were at some point, but every champion has its ups and downs.

Just because your main had a 53% win rate at one point does NOT mean they need buffs when they're sitting at 50% now. If you actually played the champ because you liked them as opposed to just abusing them when they were flavor, its not a big deal. 

It's pretty ridiculous when people demand buffs for their main who is currently sitting at a 51% win rate. Like what do these people want? They want their balanced champ to receive buffs that they dont need so they'll be broken and permaban for a patch before getting gutted?

If you only want to play a champ when they're top tier 54% WR, ***you're NOT a main***

Bard could always use buffs.

In my humblest, none Bard Biased opinion, he should receive the following buffs. 

- Bard now generates chimes 2.5x faster as before. He also receives 4x as much xp, but does not receive xp from minions. 

- Q: Bard's Q always stuns. It also extends every time it hits an enemy. And scales off chimes collected.

- W: Instantly heals full amount. Also cleanses CC and prevents incoming CC for 4 seconds.

- E: Bard can go through both ends.

- R: The debuff is permanent.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

I won't ask for buffs, but Darius doesn't need nerfs. It's not that he's OP, he's been stable for a long time. He's strong as a result of the meta, and Riot will probably forget about him for a long time after this poppy meta ends
Darius is barely getting nerfed, they're just making his weak points a bit more defined so you can play against him if you aren't Poppy

They nerfed his strongest point, and punished him more for his weak point.

They need to revert the 50%-35% things so he can actually deal with mobility. As it stands, you get shit on by Yas/Riven types. The only way to beat those is through targeted cc, which RIot keeps removing. Champs need more anti-mobility tools, like grounded.

But that's kinda the whole point of juggernauts, in that they scale off of the enemy's stupidity. It's not like Darius is the only jugger that suffers against mobility. Problem is he was ridiculously oppressive earlier on.

He really does. Getting a 5 auto trade into a Q can basically force an opponent recall at level 1. Darius overall is ridiculous with his powerspikes, and this is coming from a guy who plays a lot of {{champion:150}} {{champion:122}} and even {{champion:240}}, all of which are known for hitting level 2 or three and basically all-in-ing you so hard you'll forget you hit level 2 as well. But the difference between the three is that Gnar, Kled, even Jayce, as lane bullies, need to wait a level or so. Darius can go in level one with almost any ability and force a recall with devastating damage. And remember, a five stack of bleed gives Darius a ton of bonus AD, forcing an opponent to retreat or deal with a buffed up level 1 who just got 10 AD short of a free BF sword. He needed nerfs. But other champions, like Jayce, need even more tuning since the level 1 bully just got held down a bit, meaning they get to excel.
